item.text: From Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, to those temporarily residing abroad (in Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, the province of Asia, and Bithynia) who are chosen
according to the foreknowledge of God the Father by being set apart by the Spirit for obedience and for sprinkling with Jesus Christ’s blood. May grace and peace be yours in full measure!
Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ! By his great mercy he gave us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,

that is,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st><n id="2" /> an <st data-num="2817" class="">inheritance</st> <st data-num="862" class="">imperishable</st>, <st data-num="283" class="">undefiled</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="263" class="">unfading</st>. It is <st data-num="5083" class="">reserved</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,

who <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> are <st data-num="5432" class="">protected</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st> <st data-num="2092" class="">ready</st> to be <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st>.

<st data-num="3739">This</st> brings you <st data-num="21">great joy</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487">although</st> you may <st data-num="1163">have to</st> <st data-num="3076" class="">suffer</st><n id="2" /> for a <st data-num="3641" class="">short</st> <st data-num="737" class="">time</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4164" class="">various</st> <st data-num="3986" class="">trials</st>.

Such trials show the <st data-num="1383">proven character</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>,<n id="1" /> which is <st data-num="4186">much more valuable</st> than <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st>—gold that is <st data-num="1381" class="">tested</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">though</st> it is <st data-num="622">passing away</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="2147" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="1868" class="">praise</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st> when <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is <st data-num="602" class="">revealed</st>.<n id="4" />

You<n id="1" /> have <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st>, but you <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st>. You<n id="2" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3708" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> you <st data-num="4100">believe</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">so</st> you <st data-num="21" class="">rejoice</st><n id="3" /> with an <st data-num="412" class="">indescribable</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">glorious</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>,
because you are attaining the goal of your faith—the salvation of your souls.
Concerning this salvation, the prophets who predicted the grace that would come to you searched and investigated carefully.

They <st data-num="2045" class="">probed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">person</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">within</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> was <st data-num="1213" class="">indicating</st> when he <st data-num="4303" class="">testified beforehand</st> about the <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st> appointed <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="3326 3778">subsequent</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>.<n id="4" />

They were shown that they were serving not themselves but you, in regard to the things now announced to you through those who proclaimed the gospel to you by the Holy Spirit sent from heaven—things angels long to catch a glimpse of.
Therefore, get your minds ready for action by being fully sober, and set your hope completely on the grace that will be brought to you when Jesus Christ is revealed.

<st data-num="5613" class="">Like</st> <st data-num="5218" class="">obedient</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4964">comply with</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1939">evil urges</st> you <st data-num="4386">used to follow</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="52" class="">ignorance</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st>, <st data-num="2596" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy One</st> who <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="846" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of your <st data-num="391" class="">conduct</st>,
for it is written, “You shall be holy, because I am holy.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="1941" class="">address</st> as <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> the one who <st data-num="678" class="">impartially</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">judges</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> <st data-num="1538">each one’s</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>, <st data-num="390">live out</st> the <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3940">temporary residence</st> here<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">reverence</st>.

You <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> from <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3152" class="">empty</st> <st data-num="391">way of life</st> inherited from <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3970" class="">ancestors</st> you were <st data-num="3084" class="">ransomed</st>—<st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> by <st data-num="5349" class="">perishable</st> things like <st data-num="694" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st>,

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> by <st data-num="5093" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> that of an <st data-num="299" class="">unblemished</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="784" class="">spotless</st> <st data-num="286" class="">lamb</st>, namely <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

He was <st data-num="4267" class="">foreknown</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2602" class="">foundation</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="5319" class="">manifested</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> these <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">times</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">sake</st>.
Through him you now trust in God, who raised him from the dead and gave him glory, so that your faith and hope are in God.
You have purified your souls by obeying the truth in order to show sincere mutual love. So love one another earnestly from a pure heart.

You have been <st data-num="313">born anew</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5349" class="">perishable</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="862" class="">imperishable</st> <st data-num="4701" class="">seed</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">enduring</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

For

all flesh is like grass

and all its glory like the flower of the grass;

the grass withers and the flower falls off,

but the word of the Lord endures forever.

And this is the word that was proclaimed to you.
